AskJobType: Insert Job type (0 for full 1 for Differential)
AskJobNameToDelete: Enter the ID of the job you want to delete.
AskJobNameToUpdate: Enter the ID of the job you want to update.
AskJobsToExecute: Which job IDs do you want to execute?
ExecuteHelp:
Two IDs separated by a hyphen (-): execute all jobs between those IDs (included). 
Multiple IDs separated by a semicolon (;): execute only the listed IDs.
ErrorJobNotFound: No job found for this ID.
